name: PizzerQuest
description:
PizzerQuest is a multi-act game about getting some pizza! :)))) no spooky ghosts totally just funny wacky and zany moments!!!

The story was written by my friend chair (it's his birthday as of writing this (11/03/21) happy birthday chair :) ) and I turned it into an rpg I hope you have fun playing it!

                                                      - your good ol pal PK!
